source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_SEQ_00<tab>Fibubb Gah wishes to salvage the honor taken from his people.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_SEQ_00<tab>Im Ring der Asche ist Fibubb Gah zornig über einen Frevel der feindlichen Amalj'aa.

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_SEQ_01<tab>Fibubb Gah, unable to overlook the common thievery of the fallen Amalj'aa, wishes you to reclaim the ancestral weapons of the Forgotten Springs Miqo'te. Recover the unearned spoils of war from the crude gold coffers found in Zanr'ak, and also from the cooling corpses of an Amalj'aa brigand and an Amalj'aa scavenger.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_SEQ_01<tab>Die feindlichen Amalj'aa haben ihren Gefangenen Waffen abgenommen, die den Miqo'te viel bedeuten. Durchsuche westlich von Zahar'ak <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E90C0030502 /var> und besiege <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F2056C020502 /var> und <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F2056D020502 /var>, um <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8914020502 /var>, <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8915020502 /var> und <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8916020502 /var> zurück<var 16 /var>zu<var 16 /var>erobern.

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_SEQ_02<tab>You have retrieved the Miqo'te weapons. Deliver the assorted arms to Fibubb Gah at the Ring of Ash.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_SEQ_02<tab>Du hast die Waffen der Miqo'te sichergestellt. Bringe sie zu Fibubb Gah im Ring der Asche.

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_SEQ_03<tab>Though he claims no ties of fellowship with the U tribe, Fibubb Gah nevertheless feels honor-bound to return the unfairly won weaponry to Forgotten Springs himself. The Brotherhood soldier praises your well-rounded warrior spirit, and is certain that your feet are firmly planted on the path to greatness.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_SEQ_03<tab>Fibubb Gah will dafür sorgen, dass die Waffen zur Vergessenen Oase gebracht werden, um so die Ehre der Gefangenen wie<var 16 /var>der<var 16 /var>her<var 16 /var>zu<var 16 /var>stel<var 16 /var>len.

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_TODO_00<tab>Obtain caches of ranger weapons from crude gold coffers in Zanr'ak.
TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_TODO_01<tab>Obtain a hunter's spear from an Amalj'aa brigand.
TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_TODO_02<tab>Obtain a stalker's bow from an Amalj'aa scavenger.
TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the weapons to Fibubb Gah.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_TODO_03<tab>Die Miqo'te-Waffen zu Fibubb Gah bringen

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_001<tab>The Brotherhood of Ash strives to return our people to the selfsame glory our ancestors once knew. The fallen Amalj'aa, however, grind our honor into the dust with every misguided and ignoble step they take.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_001<tab>Nur die Bruderschaft der Asche bewahrt das stolze Andenken der Amalj'aa. Die feige Brut aus Zahar'ak tritt unsere Traditionen mit Füßen!

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_002<tab>They swagger about like spoiled children, carrying weapons stripped from Miqo'te captives as if they were hard-won trophies of war...when in fact they are naught but garish reminders of craven ambushes and common pillaging.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_002<tab>Wir achten stolze Krieger gleich welchen Volkes und achten ihre Bräuche. Doch unsere feigen Brüder haben die Waffen der gefangenen Miqo'te geraubt.

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_003<tab>It is said that the arms of the U tribe are passed down from one generation to the next─that these weapons are revered as highly as the teachings of their ancestors. Though we of the Brotherhood follow a different path, it is anathema to us that the honor of the Miqo'te should be so spat upon.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_003<tab>Für die Miqo'te sind es nicht einfach nur Waffen, sondern Erbstücke ihrer Ahnen, die ihnen lieb und teuer sind. Durch den Raub dieser Erbstücke wurde ihnen auch ihr Stolz genommen. Und das ist ein schändliches Vergehen, das wir nicht ungesühnt lassen dürfen.

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_004<tab>These Amalj'aa brigands and scavengers have not earned the right to their spoils. Search their camps, and reclaim all there is to be found. And when you have picked their caches clean, recover the rest from their bloody corpses.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_004<tab>Die Waffen wurden von <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F2056C030402 /var> geraubt. Bestrafe die Räuber und finde die Waffen!

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_011<tab>Your enemies this day are the brigands and scavengers of the fallen Amalj'aa. Slay these swaggering fools for their affronts, and recover the ancestral weapons of the Miqo'te!
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_011<tab>Die Waffen wurden von <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F2056C030402 /var> geraubt. Bestrafe die Räuber und finde die Erbstücke der Miqo'te, um ihre Ehre wie<var 16 /var>der<var 16 /var>her<var 16 /var>zu<var 16 /var>stel<var 16 /var>len!

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_021<tab>Have you returned with the arms of the U tribe?
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_021<tab>Nun, konntest du die Ehre der Miqo'te wieder<var 16 /var>herstellen?

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_022<tab>Yes, the weapons of the Miqo'te are distinct from any the Amalj'aa would craft. I will return these treasures to their Forgotten Springs heirs, and salvage some measure of honor for my people.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_022<tab>Ja, das sind eindeutig Waffen der Miqo'te. Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass sie zur Vergessenen Oase gebracht werden.

source: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_023<tab>Honored ally, once more you show a true warrior's spirit. Words are as wind, but your deeds mark your path into greatness.
target: TEXT_BANAMA109_01230_FIBUBBGAH_000_023<tab>Du hast heute erneut deinen Mut bewiesen, <var 08 E905 ((Heldin)) ((Held)) /var> Eorzeas. Du hast das Herz <var 08 E905 ((einer Kriegerin)) ((eines Kriegers)) /var>, das dich jegliche Heraus<var 16 /var>forde<var 16 /var>rung meistern lässt.
